MajorClaims.MC1: celebrities nowadays give more good influence on young people than they were previously

Claims.C1: people without talents cannot be famous in this changing world and to be accredited they need to contribute positively to young generation
Claims.C2: it is not easy to influence young people these days when they are well equipped of life skills
Claims.C3: people use their money to become an inspiration are definitely not a good mirror for young people
Claims.C4: only money and glamour look are not enough for a person to be recognized anymore, it is importance that they have to have achievements in order to be a muse to youngsters

Premises.P1: They are mostly being educated at very early ages by family or schools as to distinguish what is benefit for them
Premises.P2: the young generation these days is very conscious toward positive lifestyles
Premises.P3: We definitely do not want our children to spend money on luxurious custom or lifestyle just to be similar to someone, especially when these people are not symbols of any talent but showing off
Premises.P4: not many people can exist in the celebrities' world without any talents or achievements
Premises.P5: We are giving chances to many teenagers to show their intelligence in different talent shows, for example; The Voice, X Factor or Next Top Models etc
Premises.P6: to become a star and an inspiration for people, a person need to have real talent to compete with other candidates
